text: Tango is a 1981 Polish animated short film written and directed by Zbigniew Rybczyński. 1983 Tango: Free Download, Borrow, and Streaming: Internet Archive It won the Academy Award for Best Animated Short Film at the 55th Academy Awards. ==Summary== The film depicts an initially empty room. A ball bounces in through the window, and a boy enters to retrieve it and leaves. This series of actions repeats over and over, gradually accompanied by more and more repeating paths of different people through the room. ==Accolades== *Academy Award for Best Animated Short FilmShort Film Winners: 1983 OscarsZBIG VISION ==See also== *Independent animation *Cinema of Poland *1981 in film ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 films Category:1981 animated films Category:1980s animated short films Category:Polish animated short films Category:Films without speech Category:Polish films Category:Best Animated Short Academy Award winners Category:Polish avant-garde and experimental films
